attributes.additional_details: We want a chippy back. It is not right that we have to travel to the next area to get a simple chippy, they have 2 in the next area (Madley). Mike Walker had a van going for a while and it was brilliant, he tried so hard but unfortunately the council seemed more interested in shutting him down. We want a permanent chippy in place which we can walk to, ran by a local.
attributes.background: Once upon a time there was a chippy in Woodside Telford, then during a revamp of the area it was knocked down. Since then there have been developments in the area but no much loved local chippy. A local man tried with a mobile van but the council did what they could to stop him, yet Madley has 2!!!

rejection.details:
If you're concerned about the council's efforts to prevent a mobile chip van operating in the local area, you could raise this with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, here:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
